name: Hyper Pong
description:
How long can your mind stay focused?

Challenge your brain in this twisted 2d arcade-game!

Note: Sensitive persons may trigger epileptic seizures or blackouts.

Drag the player by holding the left mouse button.

Coming soon to Google Play!

If you want to get on a leaderboard and an easier/newer version visit: https://gamejolt.com/games/hyper-pong/226827
